name: mistletoe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an evergreen plant (= one that never loses its leaves) that grows on trees, with small, white fruits and pale yellow flowers. Mistletoe is often used as a Christmas decoration, and it is traditional to kiss someone under it: They were kissing under the mistletoe at the office party.
PhotoAlto/Laurence Mouton/PhotoAlto Agency RF Collection/GettyImages
